name: pharmacologically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the study of medicines and drugs, including their action, their use, and their effects on the body: The new drug is pharmacologically similar to aspirin. Scientists found that the food contained pharmacologically active proteins.
More examplesFewer examplesNobody wants the medals to go to athletes whose bodies have been pharmacologically altered.The herbal remedy contains a range of pharmacologically active ingredients.This substance is pharmacologically active and so affects the way that your body works.
